Hi,
I'm Nqobile,

Software-Developer.

Front-End Developer

I am an enthusiastic software developer who specializes in front end development. I enjoy problem solving and writing complex yet user-friendly code.

About Me

What I do?

I build complex, user-friendly software development, primarily for websites, web apps, and native applications. I enjoy writing and learning code, and my objective is to become a full stack engineer by the first quarter of 2024. My ambition is to become a proficient software engineer, computer science will be my next endeavor.

Why do I write code?

Computers have become indispensable in our daily lives, and I believe they will become even more so in the future. I hope to use my skills to work with people and solve problems that will make a difference in our daily lives; after all, coding is in essence problem solving, and I enjoy solving problems.
